channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 12th January
item.description:
NWD Give and take with temporary footway closure please lift and relay x2 450x450x30mm rocking raised SLABS (FW Rocking/Unstable Slab)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 12th January
item.description:
pothole in road
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large deep pothole in driving linr, 12th January
item.description:
2 holes outside number 20 & 22 Springbank Rd. Tried to add photo but that option didn’t look to be working. I have also phoned these in 70002870

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Springbank Road, Golden Valley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 12th January
item.description:
STW Temp Lights - There is no one working on site. There is no need for these lights. Customers wants to propose that stop and go TM should be sufficient for these type of works.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole on downward side of road opposite bus stop going up the hill, 12th January
item.description:
It is opposite 18 Noverton Lane. Three hole has been there since before Christmas but has got very much bigger and deeper in the past couple of weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Noverton Lane, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Worn away muddy verge and prickly bush, 12th January
item.description:
As you come up Noverton Lane and turn left into Noverton Avenue there is a slight incline. The prickly bush is over the pavement forcing you to walk on the grass verge which has become worn away. It’s muddy and slippery when wet. Your report says this problem was fixed but it definitely hasn’t been. I felt the prickles scratching against my coat yesterday when I tried to walk on the pavement and avoid the mud.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7a, Noverton Avenue, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Big pot hole, 12th January
item.description:
On corner as you enter swindon village reduced speed stretch
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Hyde Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole previously reported paint worn away, 12th January
item.description:
Outside number 42 Gratton Road Previously reported yellow paint almost completely worn away. Sub base breakdown & spilling out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Gratton Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large, growing pothole in Hatherley Road at junction with Windermere Road, 12th January
item.description:
Large, growing pothole in Hatherley Road at junction with Windermere Road. This is in the road surface at the junction and poses a significant danger to cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 231, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several large potholes on Hatherley Road junction with Belworth Drive, 12th January
item.description:
Several large potholes on Hatherley Road at its junction with Belworth Drive. Despite these having been reported as fixed just before Christmas, this did not actually happen. So the potholes have now extended to form a trench in the road, becoming a significant hazard to cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Hatherley Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two deep potholes in pavement, 12th January
item.description:
Outside 198 Innsworth Lane Previous job number - 22090334, had an email to say this job was completed! It definitely has not been touched?!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
